titleStmt.title: Certaine aduertisements for the good of the church and common-wealth well worthy the serious consideration of the most honourable High Court of Parliament late assembled, and hereafter to be assembled againe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the successors of G. Thorp,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Usually bound with: An humble petition to the Kings most excellent majestie: Amsterdam, 1625 (STC 14425).
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
